title: Mathematics Instructional Design Workshop to Strengthen Collaborative Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in teaching basic mathematics and proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: Current elementary school teachers participate via BYOD, implementing collaborative learning scenarios based on actual classroom cases

learning_goals: Learners can utilize an AI feedback system to analyze collaborative problem-solving processes with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can present at least three diverse mathematical problem-solving strategies through real-time collaborative activities with peer teachers.
Learners can observe and apply over 70% of non-verbal interactions (e.g., facial expressions, gestures) occurring during lessons to improve instruction.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
